GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v6.1.8
GSD.description:
misc: fastrpc: Fix use-after-free and race in fastrpc_map_find

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit a50c5c25b6e7d2824698c0e6385f882a18f4a498, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 8f6c1d8c4f0cc316b0456788fff8373554d1d99d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: fastrpc: Fix use-after-free and race in fastrpc_map_find
